basicInfo.name: Nia
basicInfo.flavor: A wandering magician saw Bolt and helped Nia make further improvements to the robot. A magic gem was embedded in Bolt's chest, making it even stronger.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - 30% chance to inflict Shock. [Duration: 1 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 120% of Magic Attack.
 - Increases Chance: Shock chance becomes 35%.

Skill 1.name: Megavolt
Skill 1.desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 90% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - 40% chance to inflict Shock. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 110% of Magic Attack.
Transcend Lv.2 Effect
 - Increases Chance: Shock chance becomes 50%.

Skill 2.name: Time Leap
Skill 2.desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 115% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict Buff Duration Reduction. [Reduced by: 2 Turn(s)]
 - 60% chance to inflict Skill Cooldown Increase. [Increased by: 16s]
 - 60% chance to inflict Skill Cooldown Increase. [Increased by: 19s]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 135% of Magic Attack.
 - Increases Effect: Skill Cooldown Increase becomes 19s.
Transcend Lv.6 Effect
 - Increases Chance: Skill Cooldown Increase chance becomes 70%.

Passive.name: Auxiliary Power
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants a Barrier equal to 160% of the caster's Magic Attack. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)] [Once per Round]
 - Grants Effect Hit Rate Boost. [Always Active]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Effect Hit Rate Boost to 49%.
 - Increases Effect: Barrier absorption becomes equal to 185% of Magic Attack.

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Members of the Holy Cross Crusaders, Bolt, Orly, Aquila, strawberries, chocolate, cookies, machinery
profile.dislikes: Bai Jiao, Dellons, medicine, know-it-alls, being ostracized
profile.story: After inexplicably gaining great intelligence from a lunar eclipse, Nia became a genius engineer who could make anything with the right materials. She built a robot and named it Bolt.

basicInfo.name: Nia
basicInfo.flavor: The first version of Bolt was made from scrap metal and was quick to rust. This new-and-improved version is water resistant!

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 90% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
